name: mini-store-inventory-app
description: A comprehensive inventory management system for mini stores with Myanmar language support

scripts.install:all: npm ci && cd client && npm ci && cd ../server && npm ci
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test
scripts.test:coverage: cd server && npm run test:coverage && cd ../client && npm run test:coverage
scripts.lint: cd client && npm run check && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist server/dist

author: MawGyi
